search_results.snippet:
Clifford the Big Red Dog is an American-British animated children's television 
series, based upon Norman Bridwell's children's book series of the same name. 
Produced by Scholastic Studios, it originally aired on PBS Kids from September 4
, 2000 to February 25, 2003.
